member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_MOUSE
member.summary: Defines the raw input data coming from the specified mouse.

summary.para: The bitfield of the mouse device identification properties:

| Value | ntddmou.h constant | Description | |:------:|----------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| | 0x0080 | MOUSE_HID_HARDWARE | HID mouse | | 0x0100 | WHEELMOUSE_HID_HARDWARE | HID wheel mouse | | 0x8000 | HORIZONTAL_WHEEL_PRESENT | Mouse with horizontal wheel |

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_MOUSE.dwNumberOfButtons
member.summary: The number of buttons for the mouse.

member.name: RID_DEVICE_INFO_MOUSE.dwSampleRate
member.summary: The number of data points per second. This information may not be applicable for every mouse device.

summary.para: TRUE if the mouse has a wheel for horizontal scrolling; otherwise, FALSE.
Windows XP: This member is only supported starting with Windows Vista.
